page.title: 07PEOPLE IN THEDDINGWORTH
page.content: There are 164 people on the electoral role and a further 35 under the age of 18, of whom 14 are under the age of 5. There are 39 couples between the ages of l8 and 60 and 32 single people in this age group. There are 19 couples over the age of 60 and 18 single people in this age group. 22 adults were born in the village and still live here including 2 who are over 80. Less than 12 people have lived here for more than 40 years and less than 12 came here during the last year. So it seems that the majority of people living in the village now came here since the end of the Second World War.
